subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant made 19 of 31 field-goal attempts and all 20 of his foul shots for a total of 61 points as he broke scoring records for Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Kobe Bryant made 19 of 31 field-goal attempts and all 20 of his foul shots for a total of 61 points as he broke scoring records for Madison Square Garden.
